text:
I am running PHP 5 on top of Apache. Both will be working quite well THEN,
without warning, Apache will seem to forget that PHP is there.  When that
happens and I try to restart Apache, I get a Windows error message: "Apache has
encountered an error and needs to close.  Please tell windows about this
problem."  My version of Windows is XP Pro with all the updates.
creator: danl@hawaii.edu
